name: 蒼葉
message: "Woah!"
When the gate opens, we are greeted by cheerful music and the sound of firecrackers.

name: 案内パンダ
message: "Welcome to Platinum Jail, Japan's biggest amusement park, the place where love and dreams come true!"
A strange-looking panda―were they going for cute?―totters out to greet us.
I see five white doors behind it.

name: 案内パンダ
message: "Only the chosen are allowed to enter paradise! Please, enjoy your stay!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Uh-huh..."
Not at all bothered by our lack of enthusiasm, the panda cheerfully pushes a button on the wall.

name: 案内パンダ
message: "Now where, oh where will you two be headed? Let's spin the wheel of fun!"

name: 案内パンダ
message: "Oh my! You'll be heading to Midnight Blue Coast! Right this way please!"
The panda walks up to the middle door, then bends sideways at the waist, a clownish gesture.

name: 案内パンダ
message: "Here, you will experience the true form of Platinum Jail! If you show your true selves too... who knows what might happen?"

name: 案内パンダ
message: "Please, head right in! And have fun!"
The panda waves me forward. I cautiously approach the door.

name: 蒼葉
message: "This is probably a trap, huh?"

name: 蓮
message: "The probability is high."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But we don't really have a choice."

name: 案内パンダ
message: "Please place your ticket or invitation on the authentication screen next to the door!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Invitation..."
I open the invitation on my Coil and hold it up to the screen.

name: 認証モニター
message: "Platinum ID confirmed. Welcome to Platinum Jail, Mr. Seragaki."

name: 認証モニター
message: "All privileges belong to the Platinum Jail ID. For additional details, please refer to the support section of your invitation card. Enjoy your time in the park."
